verbs.description: " [ARG0: We] [V: need] [ARG1: to stand firm against what President Trump is threatening to do to our country] . "

" We need to stand firm against what President Trump [V: is] threatening to do to our country . "
" We need to stand firm against what [ARG0: President Trump] is [V: threatening] [ARG1: to do to our country] . "
" We need to stand firm against [ARG1: what] [ARG0: President Trump] is threatening to [V: do] [ARG2: to our country] . "
